text: Harper is an unincorporated community in Albany County, Wyoming, United States. The 1916 edition of The Complete Official Road Guide of the Lincoln Highway describes Harper as containing a railroad station with "no tourist accommodations. Railroad section house. Drinking water, radiator water, camp site."The Complete Official Road Guide of the Lincoln Highway, p. 120 (1916) There was once a small coal mine near Harper, but it closed after a rush of water drove the workers away. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Albany County, Wyoming Category:Unincorporated communities in Wyoming
title: Harper, Wyoming
